content: So now that we don't have JSParty any more ( :sob: ) should we start a new #javascript channel where we can talk JS things? and maybe some TS tings if we really must :smirk:
How about a slightly more generic "webdev" channel? Or do you also want to take about non-web JavaScript things...?
is there anything other than webdev? :troll: but yea webdev seems ok :shrug:
Webdev would appeal to a larger segment of the population for sure.
You can run JavaScript on microcontrollers these days
